data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Can Braga capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Famalicao's half?
In the minute 3, Braga to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Rui Costa signals a Braga throw-in in Famalicao's half.
In the minute 6, Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Famalicao have a goal kick.
Braga have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 8, Rui Costa awards Famalicao a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Braga in the half of Famalicao.
Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 13, Braga have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Iuri Medeiros gets his shot on target but fails to score for Braga.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Throw-in Famalicao.
Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Braga.
In the minute 19, Famalicao needs to be cautious. Braga have an attacking throw-in.
Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Famalicao at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Famalicao at Braga Municipal.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Famalicao.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Ricardo Esgaio for Braga drives towards goal at Braga Municipal. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Braga are pushing forward but Nico Gaitan's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 26, It's a goal kick for the away team in Braga.
In Braga Braga drive forward through Wenderson Galeno. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
In the minute 27, Braga drives forward and Andre Castro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 28, Bruno Viana (Braga) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Famalicao at Braga Municipal.
Braga's Iuri Medeiros breaks free at Braga Municipal. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
Vana Alves (Famalicao) gets a yellow card.
Goal kick for Famalicao at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 33, Important block from the Famalicao defence as Wenderson Galeno fires in a strike for Braga.
Gustavo Assuncao for Famalicao has been booked by Rui Costa and receives a first yellow card.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
In the minute 34, Braga have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Bruno Viana (Braga) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braga.
In the minute 35, Famalicao's Ivan Jaime gets in a shot on goal at Braga Municipal. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Rui Costa awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Famalicao.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Famalicao.
Famalicao's Ruben Lameiras is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Famalicao.
In the minute 38, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Famalicao have a goal kick.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Famalicao.
Rui Costa signals a Famalicao throw-in in Braga's half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in high up the field for Braga in Braga.
Andre Castro (Braga) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Braga pushes forward through Al Musrati, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Braga to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
In the minute 45, Nuno Sequeira for Braga gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Rui Costa awards Famalicao a goal kick.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Rui Costa will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Wenderson Galeno of Braga gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
Throw-in for Famalicao at Braga Municipal.
Free kick in a good position for Braga!
In the minute 48, Braga's Iuri Medeiros misses with an attempt on goal.
Famalicao have a goal kick.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
In the minute 50, Braga have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Braga's Iuri Medeiros gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Famalicao at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 50, Rui Costa signals a Braga throw-in in Famalicao's half.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Rui Costa signals a throw-in for Braga, close to Famalicao's area.
In the minute 53, Famalicao drive upfield and Joaquin Pereyra gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Braga defender.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 55, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Braga to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braga.
In the minute 57, In Braga a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Patrick William (Famalicao) has received a yellow card from Rui Costa.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 59, Dyego Sousa is replacing Marcello Trotta for Famalicao at Braga Municipal.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Braga, Braga push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 61, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Famalicao in Braga.
In the minute 64, Attention is being given to Braga’s Paulinho and play has been suspended briefly.
Riccieli (Famalicao) sees red and is sent off in Braga!
Braga are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 68, Paulinho is back on the pitch.
Iuri Medeiros gets his shot on target but fails to score for Braga.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
Joao Pedro Sousa (Famalicao) is making a second substitution, with Henrique Trevisan replacing Ivan Jaime.
Can Braga capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Famalicao's Srdan Babic has been booked in Braga.
In the minute 74, Goal! Bruno Viana gives Braga a 1-0 lead.
Carlos Carvalhal is making the team's first substitution at Braga Municipal with Guilherme Schettine replacing Nico Gaitan.
Braga make their second substitution with Joao Novais replacing Al Musrati.
In the minute 77, Andrija Lukovic is on a sub for Ruben Lameiras for Famalicao.
Fernando Valenzuela is replacing Joaquin Pereyra for the away team.
Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Braga.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, Free kick Famalicao.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Famalicao.
In the minute 83, The home team have replaced Iuri Medeiros with Andre Horta. This is the third substitution made today by Carlos Carvalhal.
The home team replace Wenderson Galeno with Francisco Moura.
Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 85, Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo Esgaio is booked for the home team.
Braga advance rapidly upfield but Rui Costa blows for offside.
In the minute 87, Can Famalicao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Andrija Lukovic (Famalicao) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Braga.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Famalicao.
Rui Costa signals a Braga throw-in in Famalicao's half.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
Guilherme Schettine for Braga drives towards goal at Braga Municipal. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Rui Costa awards Braga a goal kick.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
